name: Scream Cute Puppy
description:
----------------------Voice Game----------------

Use the volume to control the movement and jumping.


----------------------Scream Game----------------
Scream loudly to jump. or else you will die in the blank.


----------------------Hard Game----------------
The game is very hard, if you dare to try it, just do it.


----------------------Cute Game----------------
The puppy is cute, do you like it?


----------------------Forbiden----------------
Do not play at night, I can't promise that someone will not knock on your door.
